Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value and significance to me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship, innovation, and a legacy that transcends time. I believe its true worth exceeds $1200000, but I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $1150000.

The product boasts unparalleled features and capabilities that cater to the most discerning tastes and needs. It comes with a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your complete satisfaction and enjoyment.

Considering its rarity and the opportunity it presents, I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. I would be honored if you choose to embrace this exceptional piece and make it a part of your collection.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide you with detailed specifications and additional insights.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,150,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,150,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
